bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Provides that no fishing vessel, fish processing vessel, or fish tender vessel over five tons may be issued a certificate of documentation, a registry, or a certain fishery license after October 31, 1986, unless it is built in the United States and, if corporately owned, a controlling interest in such corporation is owned by U.S. citizens. Amends Federal shipping provisions concerning the manning of vessels to require that at least 75 percent of the crew of such certified vessels be U.S. citizens.
